Others: Police in Croatia have arrested dozens of football fans after fights broke out following a UEFA Nations League match between Croatia and Poland.
The fights happened following Croatia's 1-0 victory against Poland, with the two now equal on points in League A Group 1.
At least five fans were also detained in Osijek before the Group A1 match for fighting in which a Polish national was injured.
Two people had been arrested for using pyrotechnics.
